This is sort of linked to a previous question. A student has a game where there is a map in a newspaper.

The map needs to "appear" when they turn to Page 4.

They have made the newspaper as a container
They have the map in a hidden container with a command to move it across to the newspaper

They dont however want to "Open" the newspaper but instead "Read" it.

They have made up a Read verb and written a script which gives out a message at different times as though they were reading the newspaper.

When they get to Page 4 they want the map to be listed as Page 4 is opened. I can sort of do it using the Open command but they are adamant they want to use Read. Enclosed is the script thus far.

Many thanks in advance.....
